column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Alyssa - Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not fully enjoy our fare. Hopefully there was nothing fundamentally wrong with your ramen bowl (ie. too salty
column2: not enough flavor). But do please know that if you are ever unhappy or dissatisfied with your meal for any reason
column3: just inform your server and he or she will be happy to remake your food
column4: replace your item(s) with another suggestion
column5: or remove it from your tab. Otherwise
column6: we appreciate your giving us a try
column7: especially since in Houston there are so many options for ramen these days.
